quote: Patience is a form of wisdom. It demonstrates that we understand and accept the fact that sometimes things must unfold in their own time. – Jon Kabat-Zinn
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What musical instrument is found in the bathroom? A tuba toothpaste.
